languages.text: "Если хочешь заполучить меня в союзники, запишись ко мне на прием и повтори все, что сказал, прилюдно".

traits.locale_text: "Если хочешь заполучить меня в союзники, запишись ко мне на прием и повтори все, что сказал, прилюдно".

languages.text: "If you want me as your ally, you can request an audience and repeat everything you just said in public."
languages.original_text: "Если хочешь заполучить меня в союзники, запишись ко мне на прием и повтори все, что сказал, прилюдно".

traits.locale_text: "If you want me as your ally, you can request an audience and repeat everything you just said in public."
"If you want me as your ally, you can request an audience and repeat everything you just said in public."
"If you want me as your ally, you can request an audience and repeat everything you just said in public."
"If you want me as your ally, you can request an audience and repeat everything you just said in public."
"If you want me as your ally, you can request an audience and repeat everything you just said in public."

languages.text: 「私を仲間にしたいのなら、謁見を求め公の場で今話した何もかもを繰り返せばよい」
languages.original_text: "If you want me as your ally, you can request an audience and repeat everything you just said in public."

traits.locale_text: 「私を仲間にしたいのなら、謁見を求め公の場で今話した何もかもを繰り返せばよい」

languages.text: “如果你打算让我成为你的盟友，你就应该邀请更多见证人，在大庭广众之下重复一遍你刚刚所说的话。”
languages.original_text: "If you want me as your ally, you can request an audience and repeat everything you just said in public."

traits.locale_text: “如果你打算让我成为你的盟友，你就应该邀请更多见证人，在大庭广众之下重复一遍你刚刚所说的话。”

languages.text: «Si quiere que me alíe con usted, puede solicitar una audiencia y repetir lo que acaba de decir».
languages.original_text: "If you want me as your ally, you can request an audience and repeat everything you just said in public."

traits.locale_text: «Si quiere que me alíe con usted, puede solicitar una audiencia y repetir lo que acaba de decir».

languages.text: « Si vous voulez faire de moi votre {mf|allié|alliée}, vous pouvez demander audience et répéter tout ce que vous venez de dire en public. »
languages.original_text: "If you want me as your ally, you can request an audience and repeat everything you just said in public."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous voulez faire de moi votre {mf|allié|alliée}, vous pouvez demander audience et répéter tout ce que vous venez de dire en public. »

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr mich als {mf|Verbündeten|Verbündete} wollt, bemüht Euch um eine Audienz und wiederholt öffentlich alles, was Ihr gerade gesagt habt."
languages.original_text: "If you want me as your ally, you can request an audience and repeat everything you just said in public."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr mich als {mf|Verbündeten|Verbündete} wollt, bemüht Euch um eine Audienz und wiederholt öffentlich alles, was Ihr gerade gesagt habt."

languages.text: "Müttefikiniz olmamı istiyorsanız resmî bir görüşme talep eder ve bu söylediklerinizi kamuoyu önünde tekrarlarsınız."
languages.original_text: "If you want me as your ally, you can request an audience and repeat everything you just said in public."

traits.locale_text: "Benim müttefikiniz olmamı istiyorsanız resmî bir görüşme talep eder ve bu söylediklerinizi kamuoyu önünde tekrarlarsınız."
